  • Method Details

    • supplyWarehouses

      private void supplyWarehouses(double currentTime)
      Supply all warehouses
      Parameters:

    • computePathForCamelType

      private double computePathForCamelType(Warehouse w, Path path, CamelType type, int goods, double timeout)
      Check if this camel type can pass the path
      Parameters:
      w - start warehouse
      path - path to pass
      type - camel type to check
      goods - amount of goods to load
      timeout - time for request processing
      Returns:
      minimal possible speed for this path with this camel type to pass. If it's negative then camel cannot pass

    • getFitCamelType

      private PathCamelType getFitCamelType(Path path, int goods, double timeout) throws NoGoodsException
      Find a fitting camel type to pass the path in time
      Parameters:
      path - path to pass
      goods - amount of goods in request
      timeout - time to process the request
      Returns:
      path, fitting camel type and minimal possible speed to pass the path
      Throws:
      NoGoodsException - if there are not enough goods fot the request

    • getRequestFitCamelType

      private PathCamelType getRequestFitCamelType(IOasisPathsGetter pathGetter, int goods, double timeout) throws NoGoodsException
      Find fitting path and camel type for the request
      Parameters:
      pathGetter - path getter for the oasis
      goods - goods to deliver
      timeout - time for pass the path
      Returns:
      fitting path, fitting camel type and minimal possible speed to pass the path
      Throws:
      NoGoodsException - if there are not enough goods fot the request

    • returnCamelPath

      private void returnCamelPath(PathCamel pathCamel, double start)
      Computes camel returning to the corresponding warehouse
      Parameters:
      pathCamel - path - camel pair
      start - start time

    • computePathForCamel

      private int computePathForCamel(PathCamel pathCamel, int goods, double start, double timeout) throws NoGoodsException
      Computes camel path to the oasis
      Parameters:
      pathCamel - path - camel pair
      goods - goods to deliver
      start - start time
      timeout - time for request processing
      Returns:
      amount of goods that left in the request
      Throws:
      NoGoodsException - if there are not enough goods fot the request

    • pointsTransition

      private double pointsTransition(double time, int startId, Point p1, Point p2, Camel camel)
      Calculate camel path between two points
      Parameters:
      time - current path time
      startId - path start point
      p1 - first point
      p2 - second point
      camel - camel on the path
      Returns:
      transition time

    • camelPrepare

      private PathCamel camelPrepare(Request request) throws NoGoodsException
      Find a fitting path and camel for the request
      Parameters:
      request - request to process
      Returns:
      fitting path and camel
      Throws:
      NoGoodsException - if there are not enough goods fot the request

    • computeRequest

      private boolean computeRequest(Request request, double currentTime) throws NoGoodsException
      compute the request
      Parameters:
      request - request to process
      currentTime - current time
      Returns:
      true if computing was success, else - false
      Throws:
      NoGoodsException - if there are not enough goods fot the request

    • isSuppliesFirst

      private boolean isSuppliesFirst(double currentTime)
      Check if warehouses supply must be done before the requests are processed
      Parameters:
      currentTime - current simulation time
      Returns:
      true if warehouse supply must be done before requests are processed, else false
